channel.title: CVE Feed for IBM -- Maximo Asset Management
channel.description: The latest CVEs for IBM -- Maximo Asset Management

item.title: CVE-2018-1414|2024-08-05T03:59:39.037Z -- ibm -- maximo%20asset%20management
item.description: IBM Maximo Asset Management 7.5 and 7.6 is vulnerable to SQL injection. A remote attacker could send specially-crafted SQL statements, which could allow the attacker to view, add, modify or delete information in the back-end database. IBM X-Force ID: 138820.

item.title: CVE-2018-1415|2024-08-05T03:59:39.073Z -- ibm -- maximo%20asset%20management
item.description: IBM Maximo Asset Management 7.6 is vulnerable to cross-site scripting. This vulnerability allows users to embed arbitrary JavaScript code in the Web UI thus altering the intended functionality potentially leading to credentials disclosure within a trusted session. IBM X-Force ID: 138821.

item.title: CVE-2023-38723|2024-08-02T17:46:56.799Z -- ibm -- maximo%20asset%20management
item.description: IBM Maximo Application Suite 7.6.1.3 is vulnerable to stored cross-site scripting. This vulnerability allows users to embed arbitrary JavaScript code in the Web UI thus altering the intended functionality potentially leading to credentials disclosure within a trusted session. IBM X-Force ID: 262192.

item.title: CVE-2024-27266|2024-08-02T00:28:00.241Z -- ibm -- maximo%20asset%20management
item.description: IBM Maximo Application Suite 7.6.1.3 is vulnerable to an XML External Entity Injection (XXE) attack when processing XML data. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to expose sensitive information or consume memory resources. IBM X-Force ID: 284566.

item.title: CVE-2024-27266|2024-03-14T18:32:28.919Z -- ibm -- maximo%20asset%20management
item.description: IBM Maximo Application Suite 7.6.1.3 is vulnerable to an XML External Entity Injection (XXE) attack when processing XML data. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to expose sensitive information or consume memory resources. IBM X-Force ID: 284566.

item.description: IBM Maximo Application Suite 7.6.1.3 is vulnerable to stored cross-site scripting. This vulnerability allows users to embed arbitrary JavaScript code in the Web UI thus altering the intended functionality potentially leading to credentials disclosure within a trusted session. IBM X-Force ID: 262192.
